verses.name: Matthew 10:14
verses.text: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear your words, when ye depart out of that house or city, shake off the dust of your feet.

verses.name: Matthew 10:15
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.

verses.name: Matthew 10:16
verses.text: Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents, and harmless as doves.

verses.name: Matthew 10:17
verses.text: But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to the councils, and they will scourge you in their synagogues;
